item.title: Video Editor for A Youtube Documentary Channel - Upwork
item.description:
**Seeking Talented Video Editors**

We are looking for one or more video editors who can work independently or collaboratively with a team or multiple persons to produce high-quality videos. While advanced skills are preferred, we value eagerness to learn and a commitment to constant improvement.

**Responsibilities:**
- Create videos ranging from 5 to 20 minutes or longer.
- Ensure high-quality production by thoroughly reviewing your work multiple times.
- Implement animations, text effects, and other elements thoughtfully to enhance the video.
- Source real-life footage and video clips relevant to the video's content, using stock footage only when appropriate.

**Qualifications:**
- Proficiency in professional video editing software (Final Cut Pro X, Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects).
- Strong attention to detail to avoid errors and ensure top-notch quality.
- Fluent or native English speaker.
- Ability to work both independently and as part of a team.
- Comfortable with incorporating animations, text effects, and various video elements.

**Preferred Skills:**
- Advanced video editing capabilities.
- Experience with different video styles and formats.
- Strong sense of where to implement specific elements to avoid randomness.

**Examples of Desired Quality:**
Ensure you're familiar with creating Documentary type videos that shall look as if or similar to the ones in Netflix Documentaries and please also make sure that before applying,  you can produce content of similar quality as the following channels because we will create topics that will on occasion require to look as if or similar as the ones listed below:

https://www.youtube.com/@2and20,
https://www.youtube.com/@fern-tv,
https://www.youtube.com/@SunnyV2,
https://www.youtube.com/@neoexplains

**Work Schedule:**
- Start with producing one high-quality video per month, gradually increasing to a maximum of two videos per month.

****Please put your bids in the proposals NO per HOUR RATES! Just per video editing minute.
For example a 10 or 1 minute video is (abc amount)

If you are passionate about video editing and meet the above qualifications, we encourage you to apply. Join us in creating outstanding video content!

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 15, 2024 14:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor For You Tube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!
My name is Simone and I run a growing faceless YT channel in the Economy niche. I've had some good results so far but I am looking to develop the channel into something similar to:
https://www.youtube.com/@EconofinUSA
https://www.youtube.com/@MHFIN
I am looking for multiple experienced Video Editors who can help me create engaging Economy videos.
This will be a long-term project with at least 2 videos per week.
I am also part of a community of 2000 other YouTubers who all need good video editors like yourself, so I'd happily refer them to you if we work well together.
Please get in touch ASAP if this is something you're interested in!
Kind regards, Simone.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 14:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Videography, Explainer Video, Education, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Videography, Explainer Video, Education, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Growth Consultant - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a YouTube growth expert to help with our channel and podcast growth (also email conversion, but mainly viral posting).

I've interviewed some big names but mostly flopped on YouTube. People like Anne Hathaway, Jim Gaffigan, Joseph Gordon Levitt.

I've got a great video editor but need help with the growth side of things. One video got 2 million views years ago and that led to 8k subs, but typically, small results.

Here's the podcast:
https://soundcloud.com/creativeprinciples/tracks

Here's the YouTube (last 30 days only):
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBUux6BkhC-dtP4Vj1GcgMA

Same issues on Instagram and other socials if you can help with these other platforms also (or ideally, we made shorts/reels engaging enough to work on multiple platforms).

What can you deliver? What results can we expect once we follow your instructions?

Looking forward to chatting.
- Brock

Hourly Range: $17.00-$59.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 13:58 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, YouTube Development, YouTube, Search Engine Optimization, Instagram
Skills: YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, YouTube Development, YouTube, Search Engine Optimization, Instagram
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Photo for posting - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,
I am looking for Simone who can take our product image and create a photo that we can post in our instagram. Using realistic setting for our product. Is this something you can do?
Thank you
Elda

item.title: Podcast Editor and Clipper - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an editor to edit some podcasts and podcast clips for me on a regular basis for my agency.

For now I have clips that I need to be made into a preview for a podcast client. This is an example of the type of video I’m looking for(without the B-roll):

These are the clips to use:
https://clip.opus.pro/clip/P1052715aXbJ

There is a possibility for this to become a full time position

item.title: Photography/Videos on site in Philadelphia, PA - Upwork
item.description:
We have a client based in the Philadelphia, PA. We are interested in delivering social media content for this nonprofit. To do that we will need photography mainly and some video footage on various sites and events.l over the duration of serving them. Video editing is not part of the scope of work we only need the footage. If you are within short distance of this area and have photo and video production skills please reply. Note there are no set dates yet for filming. At this time we want to learn more about you and your cost to be deployed onsite for this service so we can better understand your cost per frequency of each shooting.


Posted On: June 15, 2024 13:18 UTC
Category: Local Photography
Skills:Videography, Photography
Skills: Videography, Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Fitness model, photographs and videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a female fitness professional who also has the ability to shoot photographs on a white back ground as well as film videos showing how to do exercises.

The videos need to be shot professionally but also have some filmed organically and not on a white background.

Please show examples of work - both photos and videos

The target demographic is women afed over 30
Thank you

item.title: Editor of a podcast of ideas (With whatever additional tasks you'd like to take on) - Upwork
item.description:
I need a Podcast Editor. The job is relatively simple, involving editing of podcasts when I record them which is sporadic. I have just recorded a podcast the raw files of which can be downloaded from this link

https://riverside.fm/dashboard/studios/uncomfortable-collisions-with-reality/recordings/353a7bb8-2b9d-473e-b02c-436f98ee4fc6?share-token=56b153100f84aaa9aaf3&content-shared=recording

You can see examples of other podcasts on my channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXF2_kGDXvseeVu16Gdb0IQ

If you are interested in my work there is lots more to do if you want to get involved.

I’m making explainer videos to captivate and inspire people worldwide, to set out what I think is going wrong and what we can do about it. In addition to the podcast editing you do, if you have the aptitude, you can also get involved in:
- brainstorming how to represent complex ideas visually;
- creating storyboards;
- writing and reviewing scripts;
- sound and motion design;
- podcast editing;
- social media marketing.

This is a not-for-profit project so we are cost-conscious. Still, we are happy to pay up to $20 per hour for the right person and there may be potential for you to earn more by contributing to commercial projects for my consultancy Lateral Economics.


Hourly Range: $5.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 13:15 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Post Production, Audio Production, Adobe Audition
Skills: Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Post Production, Audio Production, Adobe Audition
Country: Australia
click to apply
